summary: THE FUEL RAIL ON MY 1995 VOLVO 960 LEAKS.  IT LEAKS AT THE PLUG ON THE END OF THE RAIL.  IT LEAKS A STEADY STREAM OF GAS THAT POURS OVER MY ENGINE.  AFTER REVIEWING VOLVO USER FORUMS IT APPEARS THAT THIS IS A COMMON PROBLEM FOR THIS TYPE OF VOLVO.  IT IS A SEVERE FIRE HAZARD!  WHY HAVEN'T YOU FORCED THE DEALER TO ISSUE A RECALL NOTICE?
